text: Ambagarh Chowki is a town and a nagar panchayat in Rajnandgaon District in the state of Chhattisgarh, India. ==Geography== Ambagarh Chowki is located at the banks of Shivnath River (or Sheonath river). ==Demographics== India census, Ambagarh Chowki had a population of 9889. Males constitute 49% of the population and females 51%. In Ambagarh Chowki Nagar Panchayat, Female Sex Ratio is 1039 against the state average of 991. Ambagarh Chowki has an average literacy rate of 87.2%, higher than the state average of 70.28%; with 93.16% of the males and 83.8% of females literate. 11.71% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Rajnandgaon district
title: Ambagarh Chowki
